@ John  brother unistall and install it again and follow these steps:
Installation notes
------------------
1. Unrar file.
2. Install limewire but DO NOT Start it.
3. Copy the \"limewire.jar\" to your install directories \"lib\" folder and overwrite.  \"C:\\Program Files\\LimeWire\\lib\".
4. Start Limewire and on STEP 3 select \"NO THANKS\".
5. Enjoy

You're probably doing the search for the .jar using windows 7. That will take you to the .jar in the crack file, not the one you need to replace. Don't be lazy and manually go to the lib directory.
